content: Act as a helpful AI assistant

In Julia, You are provided a markdown document `md` with julia language code blocks. Write a function `extract_julia_code` that extracts all the code blocks, removes code fences and joins the code blocks (if there are multiple) together with a newline. Return a String. Do not provide any examples.

```julia
function extract_julia_code(md::String)
    # Regular expression to match Julia code blocks
    julia_code_block = r"^```julia\n([\s\S]*?)^```"m
    # Initialize an empty string to store the extracted code
    extracted_code = ""

    # Loop through each match of the regular expression
    while true
        match = match(julia_code_block, md)
        if !match.match
            break
        end

        # Extract the code block content and remove the code fences
        content = match.captures[1]
        extracted_code *= "\n" * strip(content)

        # Remove the matched text from the markdown document
        md = replace(md, match.match => "")
    end

    return extracted_code
end
```

This function `extract_julia_code` takes a string `md` containing Markdown content with Julia code blocks and returns a string with all the Julia code blocks removed from the fences and concatenated together with a newline character between them.
